item.title: NATIONAL BEVERAGE CORP 10-K
item.description: NATIONAL BEVERAGE CORP, which is in the Bottled & Canned Soft Drinks Carbonated Waters [2086] industry, SEC 10-K filing on June 30, 2021 had 11988 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: fiscal - 148 instances financial - 141 instances 2021 - 132 instances may - 128 instances 1 - 123 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
